TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkLabel/Link extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter))]
[<System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter))>]

summary.span: 表示 控件内的链接。

span.span: Represents a link within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义控件内的链接的属性 。The class defines the properties of a link within a control. 您可以使用这些属性为控件的事件提供数据， 以便在控件中单击该链接时执行任务。You can use these properties to provide data to the event of the control to perform tasks when the link is clicked in the control. 属性允许您定义 事件可用于在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中显示 URL 或打开文件的信息。The property enables you to define information that the event can use to display a URL within Microsoft Internet Explorer or to open a file. 除了与链接相关的信息外，类的属性 还有助于定义的文本 及其显示状态。In addition to information related to the link, the properties of the class also help define the text of the and its display state. 和 属性定义 要显示为链接的控件文本中文本的位置和长度。The and properties define the location and length of text from the text of the control to display as a link. 属性允许您将链接显示为已禁用的链接，并且 属性可以提醒用户他们已访问的当前实例中的指定链接 。The property allows you to display the link as a disabled link, and the property can alert the user that they already visited the specified link in the current instance of the . 可以在单个控件中显示多个链接 。You can display multiple links in a single control. 每个 都添加到 与控件关联的中 。Each is added into the associated with the control. 若要获取控件中定义的链接集合 ，请使用 属性。To obtain the collection of links defined in a control, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 具有多个 节定义的类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 、、、 和 属性，以自定义的外观 。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 是使用属性指定的 。The first is specified using the property. 使用方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例 通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器，并 为其他链接显示来处理事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用链接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the link is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性在控件内显示处于禁用状态的链接 。You can use this property to display a link in a disabled state within the control. 禁用链接后，单击该链接不会导致 控件引发 事件。When a link is disabled, clicking on the link does not cause the control to raise the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Length { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Length : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置链接文本中的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters in the link text.

value.span: 链接文本中的字符数，包括空格。

span.span: The number of characters, including spaces, in the link text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定 要显示为链接的文本，请 在文本中将属性设置为开始创建链接的位置。To specify text from the to display as a link, set the property to the location in the text to start creating the link. 设置属性后，将属性的值设置 为字符数（包括在属性中指定的字符位置 ）以创建链接文本。After the property is set, set the value of the property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the property, that you want to make the link text. 例如，如果要使文本 "快速棕色 fox" 的第一个单词成为链接，请将 属性设置为零 (0) ，将 属性设置为三 (3) 。For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the property to zero (0) and the property to three (3).

summary.span: 获取或设置与链接关联的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the data associated with the link.
An representing the data associated with the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来提供与链接相关的信息。You can use this property to supply information related to the link. 此属性提供的信息可用于 提供有关链接的信息，该链接可用于处理所单击的链接。The information provided by this property can be used within the event of the to provide information about the link that can be used to process the link being clicked. 例如，你可以指定在将链接作为属性的值单击时在 Internet Explorer 中显示的 URL 。For example, you can specify the URL to display in Internet Explorer when the link is clicked as the value of the property. 你还可以使用 属性来标识当用户单击该链接时要显示的对话框。You can also use the property to identify a dialog to display when the user clicks on the link. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 具有多个 节定义的类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 、、、 和 属性，以自定义的外观 。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 是使用属性指定的 。The first is specified using the property. 使用方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例 通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器，并 为其他链接显示来处理事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定 要显示为链接的文本，请 在文本中将属性设置为开始创建链接的位置。To specify text from the to display as a link, set the property to the location in the text to start creating the link. 设置属性后，将属性的值设置 为字符数（包括在属性中指定的字符位置 ）以创建链接文本。After the property is set, set the value of the property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the property, that you want to make the link text. 例如，如果要使文本 "快速棕色 fox" 的第一个单词成为链接，请将 属性设置为零 (0) ，将 属性设置为三 (3) 。For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the property to zero (0) and the property to three (3).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否已访问过该链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user has visited the link.

value.span: 如果已经访问过该链接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the link has been visited; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不会自动表示链接是已访问的链接。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要将链接显示为已访问的链接，可以 `true` 在的事件的事件处理程序中将此属性的值设置为 。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the event of a . 使用控件的属性中指定的颜色显示已访问的链接 。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. 当包含控件的窗体 关闭后，与链接关联的所有显示状态都将被删除。Once the form containing the control is closed, the all display state associated with the link is deleted. 为了保留链接的显示状态，需要将链接的显示状态存储在与应用程序关联的注册表设置中。In order to retain the display state of the link, you need to store the display state of the link in a registry setting associated with your application. > [!NOTE] > 如果在控件中仅指定了一个链接 ，则可以使用 的属性将 链接指定为 "已访问"。If you have only one link specified in a control, you can use the property of the to specify the link as visited. 如果定义了多个链接，还可以使用属性，但该设置仅适用于控件中定义的第一个链接。You can also use the property if you have multiple links defined, but the setting only applies to the first link defined in the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 具有多个 节定义的类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 、、、 和 属性，以自定义的外观 。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 是使用属性指定的 。The first is specified using the property. 使用方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例 通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器，并 为其他链接显示来处理事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links.
